text: Amparo Grisales (born September 19, 1956) is a Colombian actress. She starred in the 2007 Telemundo serial Madre Luna ("Mother Moon")."Only Amparo Grisales Can Be Madre Luna", La Opinion, July 2, 2007. She also appeared with tenor Plácido Domingo in a music video of the Peruvian song, "La Flor de la Canela", from his 1994 Grammy-nominated album, De Mi Alma Latina. == References == == External links == * Category:Colombian telenovela actresses Category:Living people Category:1956 births
title: Amparo Grisales
